alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 10:22PM EDT until June 22 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 922 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Portland, Seminole Hills, Port Washington, Bruce, Red Head, Millers Ferry, Pine Log and Bunker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
